question_text: Which of the following are benefits of using PoE++ in modern enterprise networks? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Reduced need for AC outlets near devices
Higher power for devices like laptops and PTZ cameras
Works on coaxial cable without modification
Improved compatibility with legacy analog phones
Simplified cable management in ceiling installations
correct_answer: Reduced need for AC outlets near devices
Higher power for devices like laptops and PTZ cameras
Simplified cable management in ceiling installations
explanation: PoE++ enables higher power delivery through existing Ethernet cabling, reducing installation complexity and eliminating the need for separate AC power for many high-power devices. It doesn't work with coax or analog phones.
